      • getCenterOfGravity

        public float[] getCenterOfGravity(float distance,
                                  float angleG)
        The method 'getCenterOfGravity' gets the distance and the angle from the input, and finds the new Center Of Gravity of the Rover after the movement.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance given by the Mobility team to move.
        angleG - angle given by the Mobility team to rotate
        Returns:
        centerOfGravity

      • rotate

        public float[] rotate(float x,
                      float y,
                      float p,
                      float q,
                      float angleP)
        The method 'rotate' is used to rotate a XY coordinate in the XY plain
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate to rotate
        y - Y coordinate to rotate
        p - X coordinate of center
        q - Y coordinate of center
        angleP - Rotating angle
        Returns:
        new_coordinates

      • getTilt

        public float getTilt(float x1,
                     float y1)
              throws java.io.IOException
        The method 'getTilt' is used to determine whether tilt is greater than 30 degree or not. It reads the new position and checks the Mars map for the tilt.
        Parameters:
        x1 - new X coordinate
        y1 - new Y coordinate
        Returns:
        tilt
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
